cast.overview: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning. He and his troublemaking childhood best friend, Miles, work as movers, and when Collin witnesses a police shooting, the two men’s friendship is tested as they grapple with identity and their changed realities in the rapidly-gentrifying neighborhood they grew up in.
cast.title: Blindspotting

details.biography: Brandon H. Morgan is a Los Angeles actor originally from the Midwest. While taking a break from acting, Brandon had moved to the Bay Area and found his passion for acting again. He has now returned to Los Angeles and lives with his wife and son. He has recently appeared in a small role in Blindspotting and has worked as a Production Assistant on the show WTF, Baron Davis.
details.name: Brandon H. Morgan
